actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on photoreceptors and assemblies containing photoreceptors.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on photoreceptors or assemblies containing photoreceptors of electrostatic copying machines, which operate by reproducing the original image via an intermediate.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on photoreceptors and assemblies containing photoreceptors.
